name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: nfs.wtmax
description:
This is the maximum size in bytes of a WRITE request
    supported by the NFS gateway. If you change this, make sure you
    also update the nfs mount's wsize(add wsize= # of bytes to the 
    mount directive).

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.rpc.threads
description: The maximum number of threads to use for calling RPC call to recheck the liveness of dead node.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.self.retry.timeout.millis
description:
If any of file related block movements not at all reported by datanode,
    then after this timeout(in milliseconds), the item will be added back to movement needed list
    at namenode which will be retried for block movements.
    The default value is 5 * 60 * 1000 (5 mins)

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruct.write.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the EC reconstruction can utilize for writing.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.

name: dfs.namenode.service.handler.count
description:
The number of Namenode RPC server threads that listen to
  requests from DataNodes and from all other non-client nodes.
  dfs.namenode.service.handler.count will be valid only if
  dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address is configured.

name: dfs.namenode.top.num.users
description: Number of top users returned by the top tool

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.nodes
description: Minimum number of nodes to run outlier detection.

name: dfs.namenode.reencrypt.edek.threads
description:
Maximum number of re-encrypt threads to contact the KMS
    and re-encrypt the edeks.
